itunes:title: Isaiah 50-57 Part 1 • Dr. Jennifer Platt • Sept. 26 - Oct. 2
title: Isaiah 50-57 Part 1 • Dr. Jennifer Platt • Sept. 26 - Oct. 2
description:
How can Isaiah help Latter-day Saints remember their covenants? Dr. Jennifer Brinkerhoff Platt examines the Servant Song in Isaiah and the power of remembering covenants

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
